search then-u.s. presid georg w. bush congratul colt super bowl xli victory. indianapoli colts, formerli baltimor colts, american footbal team play nation footbal leagu (nfl). list document season-by-season record colt franchis 1953 present, includ postseason record leagu award individu player head coaches. 1953, baltimore-bas group led carrol rosenbloom gain right new baltimor franchise. rosenbloom grant nfl team, award hold defunct dalla texan organization.[1] new team name colt previou team fold 1950 nfl season.[2] 31 season baltimore, colt owner robert irsay move team indianapolis, indiana.[3] colt two super bowl championship (super bowl v super bowl xli). also play lost super bowl iii super bowl xliv. afl nfl merg 1970,[4] three nfl championship (1958, 1959, 1968). win super bowl xli colt becam first team play home game dome stadium win super bowl held outdoor stadium.[5] colt owner jim irsay hire toni dungi 2002,[6] colt made playoff nine straight seasons. five straight afc south titl 2003 2007 seven consecut season 12 victori 2003 2009, first time achiev nfl' 90-year history.[7] much team' success throughout 2000 attribut trio gener manag bill polian, coach dungy, quarterback peyton manning.[8] 2013 season, colt secur first divis championship sinc manning' departur first quarterback andrew luck head coach chuck pagano. content 1 tabl key 2 season record 2.1 all-tim record 3 note 4 refer 5 extern link tabl key[edit] peyton man four mvp award career colts. mvp nation footbal leagu valuabl player award sb mvp super bowl valuabl player award opoy nation footbal leagu offens player year award dpoy nation footbal leagu defens player year award oroy nation footbal leagu offens rooki year award droy nation footbal leagu defens rooki year award pro bowl mvp nation footbal leagu pro bowl valuabl player award cpoy nation footbal leagu comeback player year award coy nation footbal leagu coach year award afc off. poy afc offens player year award afc roy afc rooki year award moy walter payton man year award nfl roy nfl rooki year award season records[edit] nfl champion (1920–1969) super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion playoff (patriots) 20–3 peyton man (mvp, opoy)[23][24] 2005 2005 nfl afc south 1st 14 2 0 lost division playoff (steelers) 21–18 peyton man (wp moy)[25] 2006 2006 nfl afc south 1st 12 4 0 wild card playoff (chiefs) 23–8 division playoff (ravens) 15–6 confer championship (patriots) 38–34 super bowl xli (4) (bears) 29–17 peyton man (sb mvp)[26] 2007 2007 nfl afc south 1st 13 3 0 lost division playoff (chargers) 28–24[l] bob sander (dpoy)[27] 2008 2008 nfl afc south 2nd 12 4 0 lost wild card playoff (chargers) 23–17 (ot) peyton man (mvp)[23] 2009 2009 nfl afc south 1st 14 2 0 division playoff (ravens) 20–3 confer championship (jets) 30–17 lost super bowl xliv (saints) 31–17 peyton man (mvp)[28] 2010 2010 nfl afc south 1st 10 6 0 lost wild card playoff (jets) 17–16 2011 2011 nfl afc south 4th 2 14 0 2012 2012 nfl afc south 2nd 11 5 0 lost wild card playoff (ravens) 24–9 bruce arian (coy)[29] 2013 2013 nfl afc south 1st 11 5 0 wild card playoff (chiefs) 45–44 lost division playoff (patriots) 43–22 2014 2014 nfl afc south 1st 11 5 0 wild card playoff (bengals) 26–10 division playoff (broncos) 24–13 lost confer championship (patriots) 45–7 2015 2015 nfl afc south 2nd 8 8 0 b regular season mvp list associ press mvp. full list mvp see nation footbal leagu valuabl player award. c coach year award list associ press award. full list coach award see nation footbal leagu coach year award. game would later known greatest game ever played.[30] e 1967 nfl season mark first season league' histori leagu divid two confer subdivid two divisions. 1967, leagu either divid two divisions, two conferences, neither.[31] f colt dolphin finish tied. however, colt finish ahead miami afc east base head-to-head sweep (2–0).[32] g colt patriot finish tied. however, colt finish ahead new england base better divis record (7–1 patriots' 6–2).[33] h colt dolphin finish tied. however, colt finish ahead miami base better confer record (9–3 dolphins' 8–4).[33] game involv infam ghost post play.[34] j 1982 strike-shorten season leagu divid two confer instead normal division alignment.[35] k 24-day players' strike reduc 16-game season 15, caus week 3 canceled.[36] l last game play rca dome.[37] references[edit] gener "indianapoli colts: history". cb sports. retriev novemb 21, 2010.&#160; "indianapoli colt franchis encyclopedia". pro footbal reference. retriev april 2012.&#160;
